info.name: Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FLUIDR v.4
info.description: ► It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! ► It's for FLUIDR It's a cool and fast viewer for discover Flickr stream ... ► What the style do ?: - Maximize the thumbnail to cover all the space of the window. ► ► This Userstyle is s a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". The First one: Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE TOTAL (No GM)
info.additionalInfo: FLUIDR provide a bookmarklet : A quick way to move from a page on Flickr to its equivalent page on Fluidr.
